org.terrier.indexing

Class TwitterJSONCollection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.terrier.indexing.TwitterJSONCollection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, Collection

    public class TwitterJSONCollection
extends Object
implements Collection
    This class represents a collection of tweets stored in JSON format. Like TRECCollection, it expects a collection specification containing all of the files to be read. Each file is assumed to be in gzip format, with one tweet per line. The google.gson parser is used to read the tweet JSON. The TwitterJSONDocument representation is used.
    Since:
    4.0
    Author:
    Richard McCreadie

      • openNextFile

        public boolean openNextFile()
                     throws IOException
        Opens the next document from the collection specification.
        Returns:
        boolean true if the file was opened successufully. If there are no more files to open, it returns false.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is an exception while opening the collection files.
